article_title: Hillary on health care, family, and pumpkin spice lattes on Facebook
article_text:

twitter.description: Monday afternoon, presidential hopeful Hillary Clinton hosted a live Q&A session on her Facebook page. She talked about student loan debt, health care, on-campus sexual assault, and her family,...
